title: Did Walter ‘Blackie’ Wetzel Design Washington, DC Football Team’s Logo?
subtitle: The claim circulated online in July 2020 after the NFL team said it was dropping its "Redskins" name and logo.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Walter "Blackie" Wetzel, a former leader of the Blackfeet Nation, designed the Indian head logo for the Washington D.C. "Redskins" NFL team.
